tech_news.title: The LG G5 OLED TV sets a new performance standard - The Verge
tech_news.description: Thanks to the new Primary RGB Tandem display technology, the LG G5 OLED TV delivers stunning brightness and color.

tech_news.title: Pokémon to Get First Permanent Theme Park in Tokyo February 2026 - IGN
tech_news.description: The Pokémon Company announced today that it will open a Pokémon theme park in Tokyo next year. PokéPark KANTO will be the monster-catching series’ first permanent outdoor attraction, and located inside Yomiuriland, Tokyo’s largest theme park.
